name: Razorfeather Raptor
description: The Razorfeather Raptor is a medium-sized, nimble predator with sharp feathers and a powerful build. It uses its agility to maneuver through combat and lands swift strikes on its foes.
memorable: This creature excels in pack tactics, enhancing its attack effectiveness significantly when fighting alongside allies.
goals: To hunt down prey using stealth and agility, often in coordination with pack members.
relations: Often found alongside other predators or in packs, utilizing teamwork to take down larger foes.
environment: Typically found in wooded areas or grasslands, where it can effectively stalk and ambush its prey.
strengths: High Dexterity allows for good evasion and effective attacks, especially when using pack tactics.
weaknesses: Low Charisma and Intelligence hinder social interactions and problem-solving abilities.
attacks: Can perform a Multiattack to strike with both a Claw and a Bladed Feather attack, dealing significant slashing damage while hindering its target's movement.
most_powerful_ability: Pack Tactics grants advantage on attack rolls against enemies when allies are nearby, making it a dangerous opponent in groups.
senses: Possesses a passive Perception of 13, indicating decent awareness of its surroundings.
skills: Limited perception skills with a +1 modifier.
additional_information: Can knock targets prone with its Pounce ability, enhancing its follow-up attacks.
Utilizes speed to outmaneuver and hinder its opponents.
Its Bladed Feather attack not only deals damage but also impairs enemy movement.
test_queries: mobile raptor that hunts in packs
